src.etl.insert_applicants(db: DB, rows: List[Dict[str, Any]]) → int[source]

Insert applicant rows with idempotency (ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING on url).

src.etl.pull_and_load(db: DB, scraper_fn) → Dict[str, Any][source]

Scrape (injected) -> insert -> return counts.

class src.db.DB(url: 'str')[source]
src.db.ensure_schema(db: DB) → None[source]
